hotels.name: Ambika Vilas, Trivandrum, ama Stays & Trails
hotels.description: Revel in the living heritage, Ambika Vilas, and live the authentic Kerela life in the calm courtyards and cool verandas.

hotels.description: Soak in gorgeous views of gardens in a sun-filled yard with a view of nature's best and dine under the stars treading a basket full of cherishable memories.

hotels.name: Rose Amer
hotels.description: Relive the rich cultural heritage at this 6-suite villa featuring a plush pool, block painting and pottery-making workshops, and a restaurant serving authentic Rajasthani cuisine.

hotels.name: StayVista | La Bougainvillea 5 BHK Villa
hotels.description: Located in Torda Goa, La Bougainvillea offers homely accommodations away from crowded beaches but within easy reach of Mandovi River and its casino ships.

hotels.name: Villa Siolim
hotels.description: Embrace the authentic Goan life and pamper yourself with a luxurious stay at the Pool Villa in Siolim that reflects Goan architecture.

hotels.name: Le Meridien
hotels.description: Experience Goa's rich art and culture at this five-star property located steps away from famous beaches and markets.

hotels.name: JW Marriott Hotel Kolkata
hotels.description: A 5-star hotel, JW Marriott is known for its warm hospitality, opulent amenities, luxe rooms and premium dining.

hotels.name: Taj Bengal

hotels.description: Stay in a premium property located on the coastline and enjoy the best of the city and the serene beaches.

hotels.name: Caravela Beach Resort
hotels.description: Stay amid the soothing sound of waves crashing on the white sand beach right beside this scenic abode.

hotels.name: Hilton Goa Resort
hotels.description: Witness the scenic beauty at Hilton Goa, a hilltop resort overlooking lush greenery and the Nerul River.

hotels.name: Azaya Beach Resort
hotels.description: Experience luxury and tranquillity amid picturesque views of the sea in this Portuguese-inspired lavish abode.

hotels.name: The Moonlight Chalet
hotels.description: As the name suggests, you get to enjoy the stars from your bed. You'll love this unique and romantic escape which offers a beautiful view of the Parvati valley right from your bed.

hotels.name: Elgin Hall
hotels.description: Fancy a cup of tea with a relaxing stay? Book a stay at this boutique property that features luxe Victorian-inspired rooms and top leisure amenities.

hotels.description: Red Fox Delhi Airport is a four-star hotel situated just three kilometres from the Indira Gandhi International Airport and offers guests an airport shuttle service.

hotels.name: Ramee Guestline Hotel Dadar
hotels.description: Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, wedding services, and a television in a common area

hotels.description: Located centrally in New Delhi, The Park New Delhi offers luxury 4-star accommodation in trendy Connaught Place. The room decor are a fusion of traditional and contemporary design.

hotels.name: Hilton
hotels.description: Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

hotels.name: Treebo Trend Saga Comfort
hotels.description: Treebo Trend Saga Comforts is an amazing choice for a comfortable stay in case you are visiting Bengaluru for work or leisure. Located in Rajaji Nagar area, the hotel offers 15 impressive rooms with great amenities and promises a pleasant stay to guests here

hotels.name: JP Cordial
hotels.description: JP Cordial is a contemporary, full service business hotel conveniently located in the heart of the financial and commercial district of Bengaluru on S C Road. The hotel is in close proximity to renowned corporate houses, information technology companies, public sector companies and banks.

hotels.name: FabHotel Arafa Inn Gandhinagar
hotels.description: The COVID19 pandemic has made us all understand the importance of sanitisation and not take it for granted. Rest assured, our properties are following a number of safety measures like disinfecting surfaces with highquality disinfectant

hotels.name: Greens Residency
hotels.description: Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service.

hotels.name: Elite Park
hotels.description: ELITE PARK Hotel is located on Bannerghatta Main Road, just a 20-minute drive from Central Bangalore. The hotel features finer accommodation with modern amenities.

hotels.name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton
hotels.description: Ideally located in the busy Commercial Business District of Sarjapur, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Bangalore is an upscale five-star hotel offering a well-equipped fitness centre, a temperature-controlled rooftop swimming pool and spa facilities.

hotels.name: The Tamara Coorg
hotels.description: Nestled in the heart of coffee country, The Tamara Coorg is a luxury resort offering breathtaking views of the surrounding hills and valleys, along with world-class amenities and impeccable service.

hotels.name: The Oberoi Amarvilas
hotels.description: The Oberoi Amarvilas is a luxurious hotel located just 600 meters from the iconic Taj Mahal. With its elegant Mughal architecture and world-class amenities, it offers an unforgettable experience to its guests.

hotels.name: Taj Exotica Resort & Spa
hotels.description: Set amidst 56 acres of lush gardens, the Taj Exotica Resort & Spa is a tranquil retreat offering stunning views of the Arabian Sea. Its luxurious villas and world-class amenities make it the perfect place to unwind and rejuvenate.

hotels.name: The Leela Palace Udaipur
hotels.description: The Leela Palace Udaipur is a luxurious hotel located on the banks of Lake Pichola, offering breathtaking views of the surrounding hills and the City Palace. Its opulent rooms and world-class amenities make it the perfect place to experience the grandeur of Udaipur.

hotels.name: Wildflower Hall, Shimla
hotels.description: Perched at an altitude of 8,250 feet, the Wildflower Hall is a luxury resort offering panoramic views of the Himalayas. With its colonial architecture, world-class amenities, and spa treatments, it provides an unforgettable experience to its guests.

hotels.name: Amber Trail, Jaipur, ama Stays & Trails
hotels.description: Unwind in the luxurious ambiance of this stunning 8-suite villa with a private pool, spa, and a bar serving refreshing drinks.

hotels.name: Valley View, Mahabaleshwar, ama Stays & Trails
hotels.description: Experience the serene beauty of Mahabaleshwar from this luxurious villa with a private pool, lush gardens, and a gazebo perfect for relaxing with loved ones.

hotels.name: Vineyard Villa, Nashik, ama Stays & Trails
hotels.description: Escape to the tranquil surroundings of this 3-bedroom villa with stunning vineyard views, a private pool, and a gazebo perfect for sipping on wine.

hotels.name: Mango Tree, Coorg, ama Stays & Trails
hotels.description: Enjoy the breathtaking views of the Coorg hills from this luxurious villa with a private pool, beautiful gardens, and a balcony perfect for sipping on hot coffee.
